abstract: Apple turned on the tap for its iPhone App store last week, unleashing more than 500 applications. If you have an iPhone, you just might forget the device is capable of making phone calls
snippet: Apple turned on the tap for its iPhone App store last week, unleashing more than 500 applications. If you have an iPhone, you just might forget the device is capable of making phone calls
lead_paragraph: APPLE turned on the tap for its iPhone App store last week, unleashing more than 500 applications for iPhone users. If you have an iPhone, you just might forget the device is capable of making phone calls, since you’ll be so busy updating Facebook pages, coveting your neighbor’s co-op and wielding your handset to swerve around virtual racetracks.

headline.main: Sampling the Best of the iPhone App Store’s Diversions
headline.print_headline: Sampling the Best of the iPhone App Store’s Diversions
